author: Darrin Fong
name: dwi2mask Brain mask generator
description: Generates an whole brain mask from a DWI image.All diffusion weighted and b=0 volumes are used to obtain a mask that includes both brain tissue and CSF

inputs.description: Specify the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition. The program will normally attempt to use the encoding stored in the image header. This should be supplied as a 4xN text file with each line is in the format [ X Y Z b ], where [ X Y Z ] describe the direction of the applied gradient, and b gives the b-value in units of s/mm^2.
inputs.name: grad

inputs.description: Specify the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs/bvals format.
inputs.name: fslgrad

inputs.description: specify the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvecs format.
inputs.name: bvecs

inputs.description: specify the diffusion-weighted gradient scheme used in the acquisition in FSL bvals format.
inputs.name: bvals

inputs.description: Specifies whether the b-values should be scaled by the square of the corresponding DW gradient norm, as often required for multi-shell or DSI DW acquisition schemes. The default action can also be set in the MRtrix config file, under the BValueScaling entry. Valid choices are yes/no, true/false, 0/1.
inputs.name: bvalue_scaling

inputs.description: Do not display information messages or progress status.
inputs.name: quiet

inputs.description: Use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications
inputs.name: nthreads

inputs.description: Terminate program if a warning is produced
inputs.name: failonwarn

inputs.description: Display this information page and exit
inputs.name: help

inputs.description: The input DWI image containing volumes that are both diffusion weighted and b=0
inputs.name: input_dwi

inputs.description: The output whole brain mask image
inputs.name: output_mask

output-files.name: Fibers
output-files.description: the output whole brain mask image
